banner.title: Simple solution for
banner.heading: Simplified Invoice
banner.sub_heading: Point of sale in any device.

features.heading: The most user-friendly point of sale software
features.short_info: Any POS is an app that transforms any smartphone or tablet to a cloud-based point of sale system, which is complying with ZATCA policies.

features1.heading: POS on any Device
features1.sub_heading: anyPOS software works on any mobile, tab or PC. Get full POS without spending thousands on clunky hardware and legacy software’s.

features2.heading: ZATCA Electronic Billing
features2.sub_heading: Print simplified invoices in compliance with ZATCA standards.

features3.heading: It’s on Cloud!
features3.sub_heading: As anyPOS is on the cloud so you can access it anytime from anywhere in the word it's available 24/7. See the live progress of your store sales through our integrated dashboard.

features4.heading: Record Payments
features4.sub_heading: With anyPOS you can Record payment quickly and easily. We Support Mada Visa Master Etc

features5.heading: Online & Offline
features5.sub_heading: anyPOS is a cloud-based platform that can also work offline. All offline transactions are automatically synced with your store’s cloud once you get back online. So, continue selling, even when there’s no internet.

features6.heading: Multi-Store Management
features6.sub_heading: Manage multiple stores under one account from the dashboard. Track your sales, employees, and customer.

features7.heading: High Level Reports
features7.sub_heading: anyPOS central dashboard gives you the ability to review sales, customer, and overall business performances. Make better decisions with anyPOS cloud-based POS.

features8.heading: Win XP
features8.sub_heading: No need to change or upgrade your current POS as anyPOS works on win XP.

features9.heading: Multi-Language
features9.sub_heading: anyPOS supports multiple languages, and allows users to use multiple languages on any device.

deal.heading: Get The Best Deal...!
deal.list: Buy the POS terminal and get any free anyPOS software for 12 months.

support.heading: Best Technical Support
support.sub_heading: Create a ticket for helpdesk and our staff will contact you to address your inquiry or chat now

application.title: Discover our suit of inovation
application.short_info: Enjoy the convenience of full POS capabilities without spending thousands on bulky hardware and outdated software. With anyPOS, you can access the software from any mobile, tablet, or PC.

slider1.title: Dashboard Reporting
slider1.info: AnyPOS provides detailed sales insights through its dashboard reporting.

slider2.title: Anywhere Anytime
slider2.info: Access your business's live progress anytime with our cloud technology - your data is always available.

items1.title: Choose us for the best after-sales support!
items1.info: Get instant solutions with just one click to ensure your satisfaction.

items2.title: Unbeatable pricing!
items2.info: Our transparent billing plans are budget-friendly and great for your business. Get 12 months free.
